name: Aurora Cannabis Inc.
longDescription: Aurora Cannabis, headquartered in Edmonton, Canada, cultivates and sells medicinal and recreational cannabis through a portfolio of brands that includes Aurora, CanniMed, Daily Special, MedReleaf, and San Rafael '71. Although the company primarily operates in Canada, it has expanded internationally through medical cannabis exporting agreements or cultivation facilities in more than 20 countries.

fullAddress: 500-10355 Jasper Avenue,Edmonton International Airport, Edmonton, AB, CA
